name: Digestive Quest
description:
You control the stomach of a huge monster that had one too many heroes for lunch.

Simple arcade game made for the Ludum Dare game jam #33.

Controls:

Use "A" & "D" to move the left gland and "S" to shoot with it.

Use "J" & "L" to move the right gland and "K" to shoot with it.

Try to digest as many heroes as you can!
